scripts.install:all: npm i && concurrently -n "Client Install,Server Install" -c "blue,green"  "npm run install:client" "npm run install:server"
scripts.start:all: concurrently -n "Client Start,Server Start" -c "blue,green"  "npm run start:client" "npm run start:server"
scripts.lint:all: concurrently -n "Client Lint,Server Lint" -c "blue,green"  "npm run lint:client" "npm run lint:server"
scripts.prettier:all: concurrently -n "Client Prettier,Server Prettier" -c "blue,green"  "npm run prettier:client" "npm run prettier:server"
